Tucson holds strong and keeps coherent through the examination. He remains =
calm for Kenzo and the others, and tries not to flinch too much while being=
 looked over.

" I - think I neutralized the venom somewhat when I applied =
a neutralizer to the affected areas.  Guess - some of it managed to get pas=
t that and - into my system."  

He shifts his weight slowly again.  Whatev=
er was in Lamia's venom, was making his body feel fatigued.  He wasn't at a=
ll happy with being down for the count.

" Slag it, there's just some thing=
s I miss by not having my visual sensors online.  I didn't hear Lamia sneak=
 up on me, nor did my sonar senses catch on.  I - think I might need to hav=
e that checked while you're at it.  Oh, one more thing, save Nightstrike fo=
r me, I'll be sure he gives us a full work up as to what the enemy has in s=
tore for us.  And if he doesn't talk, I'll just have to stay in his face un=
til he does. No way in Primus's name I'm letting him get away with anything=
."
